cardCashing.name: Teferi, Master of Time
cardCashing.text:
You may activate loyalty abilities of Teferi, Master of Time on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant.
[+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card.
[−3]: Target creature you don't control phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)
[−10]: Take two extra turns after this one.

rulings.text: Any creatures that phase in during their controller’s untap step will be able to attack and pay a cost of {T} during that turn.
Teferi’s first ability doesn’t change how many of his abilities you can activate during each turn.
You draw a card and discard a card all while Teferi’s first loyalty ability is resolving. Nothing can happen between the two, and no player may choose to take actions.

While a permanent is phased out, it’s treated as though it doesn’t exist. It can’t be the target of spells or abilities, its static abilities have no effect on the game, its triggered abilities can’t trigger, it can’t attack or block, and so on.
An attacking creature that phases out is removed from combat.
Phasing out doesn’t cause any “leaves the battlefield” abilities to trigger. Similarly, phasing in won’t cause any “enters the battlefield” abilities to trigger.
Any one-shot effects that are waiting “until [this] leaves the battlefield,” such as that of Kitesail Freebooter, won’t happen when a permanent phases out.

Any continuous effects with a “for as long as” duration such as that of Awakener Druid ignore phased-out objects. Any such effects will expire if their conditions are no longer met after ignoring the phased-out objects.

Each Aura and Equipment attached to a permanent that’s phasing out also phases out. They will phase in with that permanent and still be attached to it. Similarly, permanents that phase out with counters phase in with those counters.
Choices made for permanents as they entered the battlefield are remembered when they phase in.

If an opponent gains control of your creature and it phases out and the duration of the control-change effect expires before it phases in, that permanent phases in under your control as that opponent’s next untap step begins. If they leave the game before their next untap step, it phases in as the next untap step begins after their turn would have begun.

cardCashing.name: Blade Instructor
cardCashing.text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
cardCashing.flavor: "Watch carefully. The gap between death and victory is thinner than your blade."

rulings.text: Mentor compares the power of the creature with mentor with that of the target creature at two different times: once as the triggered ability is put onto the stack, and once as the triggered ability resolves. If you wish to raise a creature’s power so its mentor ability can target a bigger creature, the last chance you have to do so is during the beginning of combat step.

If the target creature’s power is no longer less than the attacking creature’s power as the ability resolves, mentor doesn’t add a +1/+1 counter. For example, if two 3/3 creatures with mentor attack and both mentor triggers target the same 2/2 creature, the first to resolve puts a +1/+1 counter on it and the second does nothing.
If the creature with mentor leaves the battlefield with mentor on the stack, use its power as that creature last existed on the battlefield to determine whether the target creature has less power.

rulings.text: You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions, including those based on the card’s type. For instance, you can cast a sorcery using jump-start only when you could normally cast a sorcery.
A spell cast using jump-start will always be exiled afterward, whether it resolves, it’s countered, or it leaves the stack in some other way.

If an effect allows you to pay an alternative cost rather than a spell’s mana cost, you may pay that alternative cost when you jump-start a spell. You’ll still discard a card as an additional cost to cast it.
If a card with jump-start is put into your graveyard during your turn, you’ll be able to cast it right away if it’s legal to do so, before an opponent can take any actions.

cardCashing.name: Mephitic Vapors
cardCashing.text:
All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
cardCashing.flavor: Ravnica's safest strongholds are often neither.

rulings.text: Creatures that are going to die after getting -1/-1 will still be on the battlefield while you surveil. They won’t be put into their owners’ graveyards until after Mephitic Vapors is entirely finished resolving. If any of their abilities trigger on surveilling, those abilities will trigger but won’t resolve until after the creatures have left the battlefield.
Mephitic Vapors affects only creatures on the battlefield at the time it resolves. Creatures that enter the battlefield later in the turn won’t get -1/-1.

When you surveil, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards into your graveyard, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them into your graveyard.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, you’ll surveil last. For others, you’ll surveil and then perform other actions.

cardCashing.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cardCashing.flavor:
"Bats are welcome to eat thousands of my pets. I have multitudes more that will ultimately eat the bats."
—Izoni

foreignNames.name: Erkerturmfledermaus
foreignNames.text: Fliegend
foreignNames.flavor:
„Die Fledermäuse dürfen gerne meine Haustiere fressen. Ich habe noch unzählige mehr und letztlich werden sie die Fledermäuse fressen."
—Izoni

foreignNames.name: Murciélagos del baluarte
foreignNames.text: Vuela.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Los murciélagos pueden comerse miles de mis mascotas, si quieren. Tengo muchas más que acabarán comiéndoselos a ellos".
—Izoni

foreignNames.name: Chauves-souris des échauguettes
foreignNames.text: Vol
foreignNames.flavor:
« Les chauves-souris peuvent venir manger des milliers de mes animaux. J'en ai tellement plus qu'ils finiront un jour par manger les chauves-souris. »
—Izoni

foreignNames.name: Pipistrelli della Bertesca
foreignNames.text: Volare
foreignNames.flavor:
"I pipistrelli possono tranquillamente mangiare qualche migliaio dei miei tesorini. Ne ho altre moltitudini che finiranno per divorare i pipistrelli stessi."
—Izoni

foreignNames.name: 張り出し櫓のコウモリ
foreignNames.text: 飛行
foreignNames.flavor:
「コウモリが私のペットを何千匹と食べてしまっても構いません。まだまだ無数にいるので、結局食べられるのはコウモリですから。」
――アイゾーニ

foreignNames.name: 망루 박쥐
foreignNames.text: 비행
foreignNames.flavor:
"박쥐들이 내 애완동물들을 얼마든지 먹어치워도 된다. 내겐 그보다 훨씬 더 많은 아이들이 있고 그것들이 끝내 박쥐들을 먹어 버릴 테니."
—아이조니

foreignNames.name: Morcegos de Bartizan
foreignNames.text: Voar
foreignNames.flavor:
"Os morcegos são bem-vindos. Podem vir e comer milhares dos meus bichinhos. Tenho incontáveis mais que no fim das contas comerão os morcegos."
— Izoni

foreignNames.name: Сторожевые Нетопыри
foreignNames.text: Полет
foreignNames.flavor:
«Моих питомцев летучие мыши могут жрать хоть тысячами. У меня их неисчислимо больше, и в конце концов это они сожрут летучих мышей».
— Изони

foreignNames.name: 顶塔蝙蝠
foreignNames.text: 飞行
foreignNames.flavor:
「蝙蝠大可畅食我那数以千计的宠物。我拥有的数量之大，终将吃掉蝙蝠。」
～依佐妮

foreignNames.name: 頂塔蝙蝠
foreignNames.text: 飛行
foreignNames.flavor:
「蝙蝠大可暢食我那數以千計的寵物。我擁有的數量之大，終將吃掉蝙蝠。」
～依佐妮

cardCashing.originalText: Flying

cardCashing.name: Mutiny
cardCashing.text: Target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to another target creature that player controls.
cardCashing.flavor: Pirate captains rarely enjoy a peaceful retirement.

rulings.text: If either or both targets are illegal when Mutiny resolves, no creature will deal or be dealt damage.

foreignNames.name: Meuterei
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, fügt einer anderen Kreatur deiner Wahl, die jener Spieler kontrolliert, Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Piratenkapitäne gehen am Ende ihrer Karriere selten einfach in den Ruhestand.

foreignNames.name: Motín
foreignNames.text: La criatura objetivo que controla un oponente hace una cantidad de daño igual a su fuerza a otra criatura objetivo que controla ese jugador.
foreignNames.flavor: Un capitán pirata no suele disfrutar de una jubilación tranquila.

foreignNames.name: Mutinerie
foreignNames.text: Une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle inflige un nombre de blessures égal à sa force à une autre créature ciblée que ce joueur contrôle.
foreignNames.flavor: Les capitaines pirates jouissent rarement d'une retraite paisible.

foreignNames.name: Ammutinamento
foreignNames.text: Una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario infligge danno pari alla propria forza a un'altra creatura bersaglio controllata da quel giocatore.
foreignNames.flavor: Raramente i capitani pirati vivono una vecchiaia tranquilla.

foreignNames.name: 反逆
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体と、そのプレイヤーがコントロールしている他のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。その前者はその後者に自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 海賊船の船長が穏やかに引退できることはまずない。

foreignNames.name: 반란
foreignNames.text: 상대가 조종하는 생물과 그 플레이어가 조종하는 다른 생물을 목표로 정한다. 첫 번째 목표가 두 번째 목표에 자신의 공격력만큼 피해를 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 평화로운 은퇴를 즐기는 해적 선장은 손에 꼽을 정도이다.

foreignNames.name: Motim
foreignNames.text: A criatura alvo que um oponente controla causa dano igual ao seu poder a outra criatura alvo que aquele jogador controla.
foreignNames.flavor: Capitães piratas raramente chegam a uma aposentadoria pacífica.

foreignNames.name: Мятеж
foreignNames.text: Целевое существо под контролем оппонента наносит повреждения, равные своей силе, другому целевому существу под контролем того игрока.
foreignNames.flavor: Пиратским капитанам редко удается тихо и мирно удалиться на заслуженный отдых.

foreignNames.name: 哗变
foreignNames.text: 目标由对手操控的生物向另一个目标由该牌手操控的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。
foreignNames.flavor: 海盗船长通常都没法安享退休时光。

foreignNames.name: 嘩變
foreignNames.text: 目標由對手操控的生物向另一個目標由該玩家操控的生物造成傷害，其數量等同於前者的力量。
foreignNames.flavor: 海盜船長通常都沒法安享退休時光。

cardCashing.originalText: Target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to another target creature that player controls.

cardCashing.name: Bombard
cardCashing.text: Bombard deals 4 damage to target creature.
cardCashing.flavor:
"Want to sink a ship? Blow a hole in the hull. Want to kill a regisaur? Same answer."
—Captain Brandis Thorn

foreignNames.name: Bombardieren
foreignNames.text: Bombardieren fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Du willst ein Schiff versenken? Sprenge ein Loch in den Rumpf. Du willst einen Regisaurus erlegen? Selbe Antwort." —Kapitän Brandis Dorn

foreignNames.name: Cañonear
foreignNames.text: Cañonear hace 4 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "¿Quieres hundir un barco? Ábrele un agujero en la barriga. ¿Quieres matar a un regisaurio? La respuesta es la misma". —Capitán Brandis Espina

foreignNames.name: Canonnade
foreignNames.text: La Canonnade inflige 4 blessures à une créature ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: « Vous voulez couler un navire ? Faites un trou dans la coque. Vous voulez tuer un régisaure ? Même réponse. » —Capitaine Brandis Espine

foreignNames.name: Cannoneggiare
foreignNames.text: Cannoneggiare infligge 4 danni a una creatura bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Vuoi affondare una nave? Fai un buco nella carcassa. Vuoi far fuori un regisauro? Stessa risposta." —Capitano Brandis Pugno di Spine

foreignNames.name: 砲撃
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。砲撃はそれに４点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 「船を沈めるのか？横っ腹に一発撃ち込め。レギサウルスを仕留めるのか？答えは同じだ。」 ――棘針船長ブランディス

foreignNames.name: 포격
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 포격은 그 생물에게 피해 4점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: "배를 가라앉히고 싶어? 몸통에 구멍을 내. 레기사우루스를 죽이고 싶어? 똑같아." —브랜디스 쏜 선장

foreignNames.name: Bombardear
foreignNames.text: Bombardear causa 4 pontos de dano à criatura alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Quer afundar um navio? Abra um buraco no casco. Quer matar um regissauro? É igualzinho." — Capitão Brandis Espinho

foreignNames.name: Обстрел
foreignNames.text: Обстрел наносит 4 повреждения целевому существу.
foreignNames.flavor: «Хочешь потопить корабль? Пробей дыру в корпусе. Хочешь убить регизавра? Ответ тот же самый». — капитан Брандис Шип

foreignNames.name: 火炮轰击
foreignNames.text: 火炮轰击对目标生物造成4点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「想要把船炸沉？往身上轰出一个洞来就好。想要炸死帝王龙？一样。」 ～布兰迪竦恩船长

foreignNames.name: 火炮轟擊
foreignNames.text: 火炮轟擊對目標生物造成4點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「想要把船炸沉？往身上轟出一個洞來就好。想要炸死帝王龍？一樣。」 ～布蘭迪竦恩船長

cardCashing.originalText: Bombard deals 4 damage to target creature.

cardCashing.name: Oracle's Insight
cardCashing.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Scry 1, then draw a card." (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

rulings.text: When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you’ll scry last. For others, that means you’ll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability’s targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t scry.

foreignNames.name: 神託者の眼識
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは「{T}：占術１を行い、その後カードを１枚引く。」を持つ。（占術１を行うとは、「あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。その後あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。」ということである。）

foreignNames.name: 先知眼光
foreignNames.text:
结附于生物
所结附的生物具有「{T}：占卜1，然后抓一张牌。」（占卜1的流程是检视你牌库顶的牌，然后你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

cardCashing.originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Scry 1, then draw a card." (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cardCashing.name: Lantern of Insight
cardCashing.text:
Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
{T}, Sacrifice Lantern of Insight: Target player shuffles their library.
cardCashing.flavor: Each eye sees a different possibility for tomorrow.

rulings.text: If the top card of your library changes while you’re casting a spell or activating an ability, the new top card won’t be revealed until you finish casting that spell or activating that ability.
When playing with the top card of your library revealed, if an effect tells you to draw several cards, reveal each one before you draw it.
The top card of your library isn’t in your hand, so you can’t suspend it, cycle it, discard it, or activate any of its activated abilities.

foreignNames.name: Laterne der Einsicht
foreignNames.text:
Die oberste Karte der Bibliothek jedes Spielers ist aufgedeckt.
{T}, opfere die Laterne der Einsicht: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl mischt seine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Jedes Auge sieht eine andere Möglichkeit für den kommenden Tag.

foreignNames.name: Linterna de la perspicacia
foreignNames.text:
Cada jugador juega mostrando la carta de la parte superior de su biblioteca.
{T}, sacrificar la Linterna de la perspicacia: El jugador objetivo baraja su biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: Cada ojo ve distintas posibilidades para el mañana.

foreignNames.name: Lanterne de perspicacité
foreignNames.text:
Chaque joueur joue avec la carte du dessus de sa bibliothèque révélée.
{T}, Sacrifiez la Lanterne de perspicacité : Le joueur ciblé mélange sa bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Chaque œil voit un lendemain différent.

foreignNames.name: Lanterna della Perspicacia
foreignNames.text:
Ogni giocatore gioca con la prima carta del proprio grimorio rivelata.
{T}, Sacrifica la Lanterna della Perspicacia: Il giocatore bersaglio rimescola il proprio grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Ciascun occhio vede un diverso domani.

foreignNames.name: 洞察のランタン
foreignNames.text:
各プレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上を公開してゲームを行う。
{T}, 洞察のランタンを生け贄に捧げる：プレイヤー１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: それぞれの目は違った未来の可能性を見つめている。

foreignNames.name: Lanterna de Introvisão
foreignNames.text:
Cada jogador joga com o card do topo de seu grimório revelado.
{T}, Sacrifique Lanterna de Introvisão: O jogador alvo embaralha o seu próprio grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: Cada olho enxerga uma possibilidade diferente para o amanhã.

foreignNames.name: 洞察明灯
foreignNames.text:
每位牌手以展示其牌库顶牌的方式进行游戏。
{T}，牺牲洞察明灯：目标牌手将其牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 每只眼看到的明日契机各不相同。

cardCashing.originalText:
Each player plays with the top card of his or her library revealed.
{T}, Sacrifice Lantern of Insight: Target player shuffles his or her library.

cardCashing.name: Chemister's Insight
cardCashing.text:
Draw two cards.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
cardCashing.flavor: "My specialty is theoretical universal limits and ways to circumvent them."

rulings.text: You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions, including those based on the card’s type. For instance, you can cast a sorcery using jump-start only when you could normally cast a sorcery.
A spell cast using jump-start will always be exiled afterward, whether it resolves, it’s countered, or it leaves the stack in some other way.

If an effect allows you to pay an alternative cost rather than a spell’s mana cost, you may pay that alternative cost when you jump-start a spell. You’ll still discard a card as an additional cost to cast it.
If a card with jump-start is put into your graveyard during your turn, you’ll be able to cast it right away if it’s legal to do so, before an opponent can take any actions.

foreignNames.name: Einblick des Chemisters
foreignNames.text:
Ziehe zwei Karten.
Katalyse (Du kannst diese Karte aus deinem Friedhof wirken, indem du zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Kosten eine Karte abwirfst. Schicke sie danach ins Exil.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Meine Spezialität sind theoretische Universalgrenzen und Wege, diese zu umgehen."

foreignNames.name: Perspicacia de la quimista
foreignNames.text:
Roba dos cartas.
Recargar. (Puedes lanzar esta carta desde tu cementerio descartando una carta además de pagar sus otros costes. Luego, exilia esta carta.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Mi especialidad son los límites universales teóricos y las formas de sortearlos".

foreignNames.name: Perspicacité du chimiste
foreignNames.text:
Piochez deux cartes.
Relancez (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte depuis votre cimetière en vous défaussant d'une carte en plus de payer ses autres coûts. Puis exilez cette carte.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Je me spécialise dans les limites universelles théoriques et les manières de les contourner. »

foreignNames.name: Intuizione della Chimimaga
foreignNames.text:
Pesca due carte.
Carica d'avvio (Puoi lanciare questa carta dal tuo cimitero scartando una carta oltre a pagare i suoi altri costi. Poi esilia questa carta.)
foreignNames.flavor: "La mia specialità è l'analisi dei limiti teorici universali e dei metodi per aggirarli."

foreignNames.name: 薬術師の眼識
foreignNames.text:
カードを２枚引く。
再活（あなたはあなたの墓地から、このカードを、他のこれのコストの支払いに加えてカード１枚を捨てることで唱えてもよい。その後、このカードを追放する。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「私の専門は理論的万有制約と、その回避方法よ。」

foreignNames.name: Visão da Quimiomante
foreignNames.text:
Compre dois cards.
Recarregar (Você pode conjurar este card de seu cemitério descartando um card além de pagar seus outros custos. Depois, exile este card.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Minha especialidade são limites universais teóricos e maneiras de contorná-los."

foreignNames.name: Озарение Химика
foreignNames.text:
Возьмите две карты.
Импульс (Вы можете разыграть эту карту из вашего кладбища, сбросив карту в дополнение к оплате других ее стоимостей. Затем изгоните эту карту.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Моя специальность — теоретические пределы мироздания и способы их обойти».

cardCashing.originalText:
Draw two cards.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

cardCashing.name: Ugin's Insight
cardCashing.text: Scry X, where X is the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control, then draw three cards.
cardCashing.flavor:
"You speak to me of the threat of Ulamog. But do not forget: they came as three."
—Ugin, to Jace Beleren

rulings.text: Use the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control as Ugin’s Insight resolves to determine how many cards you scry.
If X is 0, you won’t scry at all. Any abilities that trigger whenever you scry won’t trigger.

foreignNames.name: Einblick des Ugin
foreignNames.text: Wende Hellsicht X an, wobei X gleich den höchsten umgewandelten Manakosten unter den bleibenden Karten ist, die du kontrollierst. Ziehe dann drei Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: „Du sprichst zu mir über die Gefahr durch Ulamog. Aber du darfst nicht vergessen: Sie kamen zu dritt."—Ugin zu Jace Beleren

foreignNames.name: Perspicacia de Ugin
foreignNames.text: Adivina X, donde X es el coste de maná convertido más alto entre los permanentes que controlas. Luego roba tres cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Me hablas de la amenaza que supone Ulamog, pero no olvides que eran tres".—Ugin, a Jace Beleren

foreignNames.name: Perspicacité d'Ugin
foreignNames.text: Regard X, X étant le coût converti de mana le plus élevé parmi les permanents que vous contrôlez, puis piochez trois cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: « Tu me parles de la menace d'Ulamog. Mais n'oublie pas qu'ils sont trois. »—Ugin, à Jace Beleren

foreignNames.name: Visione di Ugin
foreignNames.text: Profetizza X, dove X è il costo di mana convertito più alto tra i permanenti che controlli, poi pesca tre carte.
foreignNames.flavor: "Mi parli della minaccia costituita da Ulamog. Ma non dimenticare: sono venuti in tre."—Ugin a Jace Beleren

foreignNames.name: ウギンの洞察力
foreignNames.text: 占術Ｘを行う。Ｘは、あなたがコントロールするパーマネントの点数で見たマナ・コストの中で最も大きいものに等しい。その後カードを３枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「おぬしはウラモグの脅威と言う。だが、あれは３体で来たのだ。それを忘れるでない。」――ウギンからジェイス・ベレレンへ

foreignNames.name: 우진의 통찰력
foreignNames.text: 점술 X를 한 후, 카드 세 장을 뽑는다. X는 당신이 조종하는 지속물들의 전환마나비용 중 가장 높은 비용이다.
foreignNames.flavor: "자네는 울라목의 위협에 대해서 말하는군. 하지만 명심하게. 그 놈들은 셋이서 왔다는 것을."—우진이 제이스 벨레렌에게

foreignNames.name: Visão de Ugin
foreignNames.text: Use vidência X, sendo X o custo de mana convertido mais alto dentre os das permanentes que você controla, e depois compre três cards.
foreignNames.flavor: "Você me fala da ameaça de Ulamog. Mas não se esqueça: eles vieram em três."— Ugin, para Jace Beleren

foreignNames.name: Проницательность Уджина
foreignNames.text: Предскажите Х, где Х — наибольшее значение конвертированной мана-стоимости среди перманентов под вашим контролем, затем возьмите три карты.
foreignNames.flavor: «Ты рассказываешь мне об угрозе, которую несет Уламог. Но не забывай: они пришли втроем».— Уджин, обращаясь к Джейсу Белерену

foreignNames.name: 乌金的洞察
foreignNames.text: 占卜X，X为由你操控的永久物间最高之总法术力费用，然后抓三张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你对我讲述了钨拉莫的威胁。但别忘了，它们一来就是三个。」～乌金告诉杰斯贝连

foreignNames.name: 烏金的洞察
foreignNames.text: 占卜X，X為由你操控的永久物間最高之總魔法力費用，然後抽三張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你對我講述了鎢拉莫的威脅。但別忘了，它們一來就是三個。」～烏金告訴傑斯貝連

cardCashing.originalText: Scry X, where X is the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control, then draw three cards.

cardCashing.name: Hunter's Insight
cardCashing.text: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.
cardCashing.flavor:
"The predator knows the true way of the world. Life is conflict. Only the strong survive."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

foreignNames.name: Einblicke des Jägers
foreignNames.text: Bestimme eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst. Immer wenn die Kreatur in diesem Zug einem Spieler oder einem Planeswalker Kampfschaden zufügt, ziehe entsprechend viele Karten.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Das Raubtier weiß, wie die Welt funktioniert. Leben bedeutet Konflikt. Nur die Starken überleben."
—Garruk Wildsprecher

foreignNames.name: Perspicacia del cazador
foreignNames.text: Elige la criatura objetivo que controlas. Siempre que esa criatura haga daño de combate a un jugador o planeswalker este turno, roba esa misma cantidad de cartas.
foreignNames.flavor:
"El depredador conoce el verdadero rostro del mundo. La vida es un conflicto. Solo los fuertes sobreviven".
—Garruk Portavoz Salvaje

foreignNames.name: Perspicacité du chasseur
foreignNames.text: Choisissez une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez. À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur ou à un planeswalker ce tour-ci, piochez autant de cartes.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Le prédateur sait comment fonctionne vraiment le monde. La vie n'est que conflit. Seuls les plus forts survivent. »
—Garruk Languebestion

foreignNames.name: Intuito del Cacciatore
foreignNames.text: Scegli una creatura bersaglio che controlli. Ogniqualvolta quella creatura infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore o a un planeswalker in questo turno, pesca altrettante carte.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Il predatore sa come funziona in realtà il mondo. La vita è conflitto. Solo i forti sopravvivono."
—Garruk Lingua Selvaggia

foreignNames.name: 狩人の眼識
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、そのクリーチャーがプレイヤー１人かプレインズウォーカー１体に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、その点数に等しい枚数のカードを引く。
foreignNames.flavor:
「捕食者は世界の真のあり方を知っている。生命とは戦いだ。強いものだけが生き残る。」
――野生語りのガラク

foreignNames.name: Percepção do Caçador
foreignNames.text: Escolha uma criatura alvo que você controla. Toda vez que aquela criatura causar dano de combate a um jogador ou a um planeswalker neste turno, compre uma quantidade equivalente de cards.
foreignNames.flavor:
"O predador conhece o mundo como ele é. A vida é um conflito. Apenas os fortes sobrevivem."
— Garruk Falabravo

foreignNames.name: Проницательность Охотника
foreignNames.text: Выберите целевое существо под вашим контролем. Каждый раз, когда то существо наносит боевые повреждения игроку или planeswalker'у в этом ходу, возьмите столько же карт.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Хищник знает истинный порядок в мире. Жизнь — это борьба. Выживают лишь сильные».
— Гаррук Дикоречивый

cardCashing.originalText: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.

cardCashing.name: Profane Insight
cardCashing.text: You draw a card and you lose 1 life. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

rulings.text: An adventurer card is a creature card in every zone except the stack, as well as while on the stack if not cast as an Adventure. Ignore its alternative characteristics in those cases. For example, while it’s in your graveyard, Giant Killer is a white creature card whose converted mana cost is 1. It can’t be the target of the triggered ability of Mystic Sanctuary.

When casting a spell as an Adventure, use the alternative characteristics and ignore all of the card’s normal characteristics. The spell’s color, mana cost, converted mana cost, and so on are determined by only those alternative characteristics. If the spell leaves the stack, it immediately resumes using its normal characteristics.

If you cast an adventurer card as an Adventure, use only its alternative characteristics to determine whether it’s legal to cast that spell. For example, if Giant Killer is exiled with the last ability of Vivien, Champion of the Wilds, you can’t cast it as Chop Down.

If a spell is cast as an Adventure, its controller exiles it instead of putting it into its owner’s graveyard as it resolves. For as long as it remains exiled, that player may cast it as a creature spell. If an Adventure spell leaves the stack in any way other than resolving (most likely by being countered or by failing to resolve because its targets have all become illegal), that card won’t be exiled and the spell’s controller won’t be able to cast it as a creature later.
If an adventurer card ends up in exile for any other reason than by exiling itself while resolving, it won’t give you permission to cast it as a creature spell.
You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions for the creature spell you cast from exile. Normally, you’ll be able to cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
If an effect copies an Adventure spell, that copy is exiled as it resolves. It ceases to exist as a state-based action; it’s not possible to cast the copy as a creature.

If an object becomes a copy of an object that has an Adventure, the copy also has an Adventure. If it changes zones, it will either cease to exist (if it’s a token) or cease to be a copy (if it’s a nontoken permanent), and so you won’t be able to cast it as an Adventure.

If an effect instructs you to choose a card name, you may choose the alternative Adventure name. Consider only the alternative characteristics to determine whether that is an appropriate name to choose.

Casting a card as an Adventure isn’t casting it for an alternative cost. Effects that allow you to cast a spell for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost may allow you to apply those to the Adventure.

foreignNames.name: Profane Einsicht
foreignNames.text: Du ziehst eine Karte und verlierst 1 Lebenspunkt. (Schicke diese Karte dann ins Exil. Du kannst sie später als Kreatur aus dem Exil wirken.)

foreignNames.name: Visión profana
foreignNames.text: Robas una carta y pierdes 1 vida. (Luego, exilia esta carta. Puedes lanzar la criatura más adelante desde el exilio.)

foreignNames.name: Perspicacité profane
foreignNames.text: Vous piochez une carte et vous perdez 1 point de vie. (Puis exilez cette carte. Vous pouvez lancer la créature plus tard depuis l'exil.)

foreignNames.name: Intuizione Profana
foreignNames.text: Pesca una carta e perdi 1 punto vita. (Poi esilia questa carta. Puoi lanciare la creatura in seguito dall'esilio.)

foreignNames.name: 不敬な洞察
foreignNames.text: あなたはカードを１枚引き、あなたは１点のライフを失う。（その後、このカードを追放する。あなたは後で追放領域からこのクリーチャーを唱えてもよい。）

foreignNames.name: 불경한 통찰력
foreignNames.text: 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑고 생명 1점을 잃는다. (그 후 이 카드를 추방한다. 당신은 나중에 추방 영역에서 이 생물을 발동할 수 있다.)

foreignNames.name: Percepção Profana
foreignNames.text: Você compra um card e perde 1 ponto de vida. (Depois, exile este card. Você pode conjurar a criatura posteriormente do exílio.)

foreignNames.name: Темное Озарение
foreignNames.text: Вы берете карту и теряете 1 жизнь. (Затем изгоните эту карту. Позже вы можете разыграть эту карту как существо из изгнания.)

foreignNames.name: 渎神洞察
foreignNames.text: 你抓一张牌且你失去1点生命。（然后放逐此牌。之后你还可以从放逐区中施放该生物。）

foreignNames.name: 瀆神洞察
foreignNames.text: 你抽一張牌且你失去1點生命。（然後放逐此牌。之後你還可以從放逐區中施放該生物。）

cardCashing.originalText: You draw a card and you lose 1 life. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

cardCashing.name: Leapfrog
cardCashing.text: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.
cardCashing.flavor:
"Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."
—Yolov, Simic bioengineer

foreignNames.name: Springfrosch
foreignNames.text: Der Springfrosch hat Flugfähigkeit, solange du in diesem Zug einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei gewirkt hast.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Die meisten konkurrieren am Boden um Insekten. Einige lungern in der Nähe der Izzet-Labore herum und nutzen den thermalen Auftrieb."
—Yolov, Simic-Bioingenieur

foreignNames.name: Rana saltarina
foreignNames.text: La Rana saltarina tiene la habilidad de volar mientras hayas lanzado un hechizo de instantáneo o de conjuro este turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"La mayoría compite por los insectos a nivel de suelo, pero algunas habitan cerca de laboratorios ízzet y aprovechan las corrientes termales ascendentes".
—Yólov, bioingeniero simic

foreignNames.name: Saute-grenouille
foreignNames.text: La Saute-grenouille a le vol tant que vous avez lancé un sort d'éphémère ou de rituel ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor:
« La plupart se disputent des insectes au niveau de la rue. Certaines résident près des laboratoires d'Izzet, et utilisent les courants thermiques ascendants. »
—Yolov, bio-ingénieur simic

foreignNames.name: Rana Balzante
foreignNames.text: La Rana Balzante ha volare se hai lanciato una magia istantaneo o stregoneria in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"La maggior parte si disputa gli insetti a livello stradale. Alcune vivono vicino ai laboratori Izzet e cavalcano le correnti termiche ascendenti."
—Yolov, bioingegnere Simic

foreignNames.name: 跳び蛙
foreignNames.text: このターンにあなたがインスタントかソーサリーである呪文を唱えていたなら、跳び蛙は飛行を持つ。
foreignNames.flavor:
「大半は街路で昆虫を取り合っているが、イゼットの実験室の近くに住んで上昇気流を利用するものもいる。」
――シミックの生技師、ヨロフ

foreignNames.name: 도약하는 개구리
foreignNames.text: 당신이 이번 턴에 순간마법 또는 집중마법을 발동한 한 도약하는 개구리는 비행을 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"대부분은 거리에서 벌레들을 가지고 서로 경쟁하지. 몇몇은 이젯 실험실 주변에 살면서 상승 기류를 탄다네."
—시믹 생명공학자, 욜로브

foreignNames.name: Sapo-saltador
foreignNames.text: Sapo-saltador tem voar contanto que você tenha conjurado uma mágica instantânea ou feitiço neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor:
"A maioria compete por insetos nas ruas. Alguns vivem perto de laboratórios dos Izzet e planam nas correntes ascendentes."
— Yolov, bioengenheiro Simic

foreignNames.name: Квакша
foreignNames.text: Квакша имеет Полет, если в этом ходу вы уже разыграли мгновенное заклинание или волшебство.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Большинство из них соперничает за насекомых на уровне улиц. А некоторые селятся рядом с лабораториями Иззетов и осваивают восходящие потоки».
— Йолов, биоинженер Симиков

foreignNames.name: 跃蛙
foreignNames.text: 只要你本回合中施放过瞬间或法术咒语，跃蛙便具有飞行异能。
foreignNames.flavor:
「多数只在地上捕食昆虫。有些则会栖息在伊捷实验室附近，借着热气流高升。」
～析米克生物工程师约洛夫

foreignNames.name: 躍蛙
foreignNames.text: 只要你本回合中施放過瞬間或巫術咒語，躍蛙便具有飛行異能。
foreignNames.flavor:
「多數只在地上捕食昆蟲。有些則會棲息在伊捷實驗室附近，藉著熱氣流高昇。」
～析米克生物工程師約洛夫

cardCashing.originalText: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

cardCashing.name: Izzet Guildgate
cardCashing.text:
Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
cardCashing.flavor:
"Yesterday I didn't recognize my own guild. Today I see why. And for tomorrow I must be prepared."
—Niv-Mizzet

rulings.text: The subtype Gate has no special rules significance, but other spells and abilities may refer to it.
Gate is not a basic land type.

cardCashing.originalText:
Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

cardCashing.name: Mountain
cardCashing.originalText: R

cardCashing.name: Selesnya Guildgate
cardCashing.text:
Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
cardCashing.flavor: The Selesnya welcome all to help them heal the city's wounds. The price, however, is devotion to the guild and a selfless belief in Trostani.

foreignNames.name: Selesnija-Gildeneingang
foreignNames.text:
Der Selesnija-Gildeneingang kommt getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {G} oder {W}.
foreignNames.flavor: Bei den Selesnija sind alle willkommen, die helfen können, die Wunden der Stadt zu heilen. Der Preis dafür ist die selbstlose Hingabe an die Gilde und der bedingungslose Glaube an Trostani.

foreignNames.name: Portal del Gremio Selesnya
foreignNames.text:
El Portal del Gremio Selesnya entra al campo de batalla girado.
{T}: Agrega {G} o {W} a tu reserva de maná.
foreignNames.flavor: Los selesnya aceptan ayuda para curar las heridas de la ciudad. Pero el precio es la devoción al gremio y una fe ciega en Trostani.

foreignNames.name: Porte de la guilde de Selesnya
foreignNames.text:
La Porte de la guilde de Selesnya arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
{T} : Ajoutez {G} ou {W} à votre réserve.
foreignNames.flavor: Les Selesnya accueillent quiconque veut les aider à soigner les blessures de la cité. Le coût, en revanche, est une dévotion inconditionnelle à la guilde et une foi pure en Trostani.

foreignNames.name: Cancello della Gilda di Selesnya
foreignNames.text:
Il Cancello della Gilda di Selesnya entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
{T}: Aggiungi {G} o {W} alla tua riserva di mana.
foreignNames.flavor: Selesnya accoglie quanti vogliono aiutare a curare le ferite della città. Il prezzo, però, è la dedizione alla gilda e una disinteressata fiducia in Trostani.

foreignNames.name: セレズニアのギルド門
foreignNames.text:
セレズニアのギルド門はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}か{W}を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: セレズニアは傷ついた街を癒やすため、すべてを受け入れる。ただしその代価はギルドへの献身とトロスターニへの無私なる信頼である。

foreignNames.name: Portão da Guilda Selesnya
foreignNames.text:
Portão da Guilda Selesnya entra no campo de batalha virado.
{T}: Adicione {G} ou {W} à sua reserva de mana.
foreignNames.flavor: Os Selesnya convidam todos a ajudá-los a curar as feridas da cidade. Mas mediante um preço: devoção à guilda e crença incondicional em Trostani.

cardCashing.originalText:
Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

cardCashing.name: Insight
cardCashing.text: Whenever an opponent casts a green spell, you draw a card.
cardCashing.flavor:
"We can fight with you or against you. After my day, I'd prefer the former."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

foreignNames.name: Einblicke
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn einer Deiner Gegner einen grünen Zauberspruch spielt, ziehe eine Karte.

cardCashing.originalText: Whenever one of your opponents plays a green spell, you draw a card.

cardCashing.name: Seeker of Insight
cardCashing.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. Activate this ability only if you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.
cardCashing.flavor: The Trial of Knowledge challenges and broadens the minds of initiates.

rulings.text: It doesn’t matter whether the noncreature spell has resolved or was countered, as long as it was cast. That spell may even still be on the stack when you activate Seeker of Insight’s ability.

foreignNames.name: Sucher der Einsicht
foreignNames.text: {T}: Ziehe eine Karte und wirf dann eine Karte ab. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls du in diesem Zug einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch gewirkt hast.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Prüfung des Wissens fordert den Verstand und erweitert den Horizont der Geweihten.

foreignNames.name: Buscador de conocimiento
foreignNames.text: {T}: Roba una carta, luego descarta una carta. Activa esta habilidad solo si lanzaste un hechizo que no sea de criatura este turno.
foreignNames.flavor: La Prueba de conocimiento desafía y expande las mentes de los iniciados.

foreignNames.name: Chercheur de perspicacité
foreignNames.text: {T} : Piochez une carte, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte. N'activez cette capacité que si vous avez lancé un sort non-créature ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: L'Épreuve de connaissance stimule l'esprit des adeptes et élargit leurs horizons.

foreignNames.name: Cercatore di Sapienza
foreignNames.text: {T}: Pesca una carta, poi scarta una carta. Attiva questa abilità solo se hai lanciato una magia non creatura in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: L'Ordalia della Conoscenza mette alla prova e amplia le menti degli iniziati.

foreignNames.name: 洞察の探求者
foreignNames.text: {T}：カードを１枚引き、その後カード１枚を捨てる。この能力は、あなたがこのターンにクリーチャーでない呪文を唱えていたときにのみ起動できる。
foreignNames.flavor: 知識の試練では修練者の精神が試され視野を広げる。

foreignNames.name: 통찰의 추구자
foreignNames.text: {T}: 카드 한 장을 뽑은 후 카드 한 장을 버린다. 당신이 이 턴에 생물이 아닌 주문을 발동한 경우에만 이 능력을 활성화할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 지식의 시험은 입회자들의 정신을 시험하고 확장한다.

foreignNames.name: Buscador do Discernimento
foreignNames.text: {T}: Compre um card e depois descarte um card. Ative esta habilidade somente se você tiver conjurado uma mágica que não seja de criatura neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: A Prova do Conhecimento desafia e expande as mentes dos iniciados.

foreignNames.name: Искатель Озарения
foreignNames.text: {T}: возьмите карту, затем сбросьте карту. Активируйте эту способность, только если в этом ходу вы уже разыграли не являющееся существом заклинание.
foreignNames.flavor: Испытание Знания становится проверкой разума послушника, одновременно расширяя его границы.

foreignNames.name: 探解客
foreignNames.text: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。只能于你施放过非生物咒语的回合中起动此异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 知识祀炼能挑战并拓展祀徒的心智。

foreignNames.name: 探解客
foreignNames.text: {T}：抽一張牌，然後棄一張牌。只能於你施放過非生物咒語的回合中起動此異能。
foreignNames.flavor: 知識祀煉能挑戰並拓展祀徒的心智。

cardCashing.originalText: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. Activate this ability only if you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.

cardCashing.name: Manifold Insights
cardCashing.text: Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Starting with the next opponent in turn order, each opponent chooses a different nonland card from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

rulings.text: If there aren’t enough nonland cards for each opponent to choose one, all of the nonland cards are put into your hand.
Once the top ten cards of your library are revealed, no player may take any other actions until Manifold Insights has been completely resolved.
After Manifold Insights resolves, if it’s your turn, you may play one of the cards if it’s legal to do so before any other player can take any action.

foreignNames.name: Vielfältige Einblicke
foreignNames.text: Decke die obersten zehn Karten deiner Bibliothek auf. Beginnend mit dem nächsten Gegner in Zugreihenfolge bestimmt jeder Gegner eine unterschiedliche Karte, die kein Land ist. Nimm die bestimmten Karten auf deine Hand und lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Perspicacia múltiple
foreignNames.text: Muestra las diez primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Comenzando por el siguiente oponente por orden de turno, cada oponente elige una carta que no sea tierra que se encuentre entre ellas. Pon las cartas elegidas en tu mano y el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en un orden aleatorio.

foreignNames.name: Nombreuses connaissances
foreignNames.text: Révélez les dix cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. En commençant par le prochain adversaire dans l'ordre du tour, chaque adversaire choisit une carte non-terrain différente parmi elles. Mettez les cartes choisies dans votre main et le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans un ordre aléatoire.

foreignNames.name: Innumerevoli Intuizioni
foreignNames.text: Rivela le prime dieci carte del tuo grimorio. A partire dal prossimo avversario in ordine di turno, ogni avversario sceglie tra esse una carta non terra diversa. Aggiungi le carte scelte alla tua mano e metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in ordine casuale.

foreignNames.name: 多様な洞察力
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを10枚公開する。ターン順で次の対戦相手から始めて、各対戦相手はそれぞれ、その中から異なる土地でないカード１枚を選ぶ。選ばれたカードをあなたの手札に加え、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に無作為の順番で置く。

foreignNames.name: Visões Multifacetadas
foreignNames.text: Revele os dez cards do topo de seu grimório. A começar pelo próximo oponente na ordem dos turnos, cada oponente escolhe dentre eles um card diferente que não seja terreno. Coloque os cards escolhidos em sua mão e o restante no fundo de seu grimório em ordem aleatória.

foreignNames.name: 多相眼光
foreignNames.text: 展示你牌库顶的十张牌。所有对手依照回合的顺序，从接下来的对手开始，各选择其中一张非地牌，且不能重复选择。将被选中的牌置于你手上，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

cardCashing.originalText: Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Starting with the next opponent in turn order, each opponent chooses a different nonland card from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cardCashing.name: Air Elemental
cardCashing.text: Flying
cardCashing.flavor:
"The East Wind, an interloper in the dominions of Westerly Weather, is an impassive-faced tyrant with a sharp poniard held behind his back for a treacherous stab."
—Joseph Conrad, *The Mirror of the Sea*

foreignNames.name: Luftelementar
foreignNames.text: Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Der Ostwind ist ein Eindringling im Reich des Wetter des Westens; er ist ein Tyrann mit ungerührtem Blick, der hinter dem Rücken den Dolch schon bereit zum verräterischen Stoß hält." —Joseph Conrad, Der Spiegel der See

foreignNames.name: Elemental de aire
foreignNames.text: Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)
foreignNames.flavor: "El viento del este, un entrometido en los dominios del clima del oeste, es un tirano impasible con una daga afilada guardada en su espalda lista para una estocada traicionera." —Joseph Conrad, El espejo del mar

foreignNames.name: Élémental d'air
foreignNames.text: Vol (Cette créature ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)

cardCashing.name: Abundance
cardCashing.text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: This replacement effect replaces the draw, so nothing that triggers on a draw will trigger.

If you use this on a multi-card draw, each replaced draw is handled separately. In other words, you reveal and then put on the bottom of the library for the first card, then do the same for the second, and so on. In a multi-card draw you do not have to choose how many of those draws will be replaced before you do any drawing or use of this card.
If no card of the chosen type is found before your library empties, you don’t get a card, but you do get to order all the cards in your library any way you choose.

If your library is empty, Abundance can prevent you from losing the game for being unable to draw a card. If an effect or turn-based action would cause you to draw a card, you can replace that draw with Abundance’s replacement effect. (It doesn’t matter that you’d be unable to actually draw a card.) Since Abundance’s effect has you put a card into your hand instead of drawing a card, you’ll never be forced to draw a card with an empty library.

cardCashing.name: Hammer Dropper
cardCashing.text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
cardCashing.flavor: Giants know a solid hit is one part strength, four parts leverage.

rulings.text: Mentor compares the power of the creature with mentor with that of the target creature at two different times: once as the triggered ability is put onto the stack, and once as the triggered ability resolves. If you wish to raise a creature’s power so its mentor ability can target a bigger creature, the last chance you have to do so is during the beginning of combat step.

If the target creature’s power is no longer less than the attacking creature’s power as the ability resolves, mentor doesn’t add a +1/+1 counter. For example, if two 3/3 creatures with mentor attack and both mentor triggers target the same 2/2 creature, the first to resolve puts a +1/+1 counter on it and the second does nothing.
If the creature with mentor leaves the battlefield with mentor on the stack, use its power as that creature last existed on the battlefield to determine whether the target creature has less power.

rulings.text: If multiple “extra turn” effects resolve in the same turn, take them in the reverse of the order that the effects resolved.

The choice of whether or not to skip a turn is made as that turn would begin, and only if Time Vault is tapped at that time. If you choose to skip your turn, Time Vault untaps before anything else happens in the next turn.
This wording means that you no longer end up skipping multiple turns if you find a way to activate the ability multiple times.

cardCashing.name: Immediate Action
cardCashing.text:
Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.)
Creatures you control with the chosen name have haste.

rulings.text: Conspiracies are never put into your deck. Instead, you put any number of conspiracies from your card pool into the command zone as the game begins. These conspiracies are face up unless they have hidden agenda, in which case they begin the game face down.
A conspiracy doesn’t count as a card in your deck for purposes of meeting minimum deck size requirements. (In most drafts, the minimum deck size is 40 cards.)

You don’t have to play with any conspiracy you draft. However, you have only one opportunity to put conspiracies into the command zone, as the game begins. You can’t put conspiracies into the command zone after this point.
You can look at any player’s face-up conspiracies at any time. You’ll also know how many face-down conspiracies a player has in the command zone, although you won’t know what they are.
A conspiracy’s static and triggered abilities function as long as that conspiracy is face-up in the command zone.
Conspiracies are colorless, have no mana cost, and can’t be cast as spells.
Conspiracies aren’t legal for any sanctioned Constructed format, but may be included in other Limited formats, such as Cube Draft.
You name the card as the game begins, as you put the conspiracy into the command zone, not as you turn the face-down conspiracy face up.

There are several ways to secretly name a card, including writing the name on a piece of paper that’s kept with the face-down conspiracy. If you have multiple face-down conspiracies, you may name a different card for each one. It’s important that each named card is clearly associated with only one of the conspiracies.
You must name a Magic card. Notably, you can’t name a token (except in the unusual case that a token’s name matches the name of a card, such as Illusion).
If you play multiple games after the draft, you can name a different card in each new game.

As a special action, you may turn a face-down conspiracy face up. You may do so any time you have priority. This action doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Once face up, the named card is revealed and the conspiracy’s abilities will affect the game.
At the end of the game, you must reveal any face-down conspiracies you own in the command zone to all players.

A conspiracy with hidden agenda that has a triggered ability must be face up before that ability’s trigger condition is met in order for it to trigger. Turning it face up afterward won’t have any effect.

At the end of the game, you must reveal any face-down conspiracies you own in the command zone to all players. Notably, you can’t bluff conspiracies with hidden agenda by putting other cards into the command zone face down as the game starts.

cardCashing.name: Morphic Tide
cardCashing.text: When you encounter Morphic Tide, each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, land, and planeswalker cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library in any order. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)

rulings.text: This ability is very similar to that of Warp World, but note that planeswalkers are put onto the battlefield.

Taking it slowly, here's what happens when Morphic Tide's ability resolves: 1) Each player counts the number of permanents they own. 2) Each player shuffles those permanents into their library. 3) Each player reveals cards from the top of their library equal to the number that player counted. 4) Each player puts all artifact, creature, land, and planeswalker cards revealed this way onto the battlefield. All of these cards enter the battlefield at the same time. 5) Each player puts all enchantment cards revealed this way onto the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way can enchant an artifact, creature, land, or planeswalker that was already put onto the battlefield, but can't enchant an enchantment that's being put onto the battlefield at the same time as it. If multiple players have Auras to put onto the battlefield, the player whose turn it is announces what their Auras will enchant, then each other player in turn order does the same, then all enchantments (both Auras and non-Auras) enter the battlefield at the same time. 6) Each player puts all of their other revealed cards (instants, sorceries, and Auras that can't enchant anything) on the bottom of their library in any order.

Cards such as Sakashima’s Student that can enter the battlefield as a copy of another permanent won’t be able to enter the battlefield as a copy of a permanent that’s entering the battlefield at the same time.

After all permanents are put onto the battlefield and you planeswalk away from Morphic Tide, any abilities that triggered from those permanents entering the battlefield, from the previous generation of permanents leaving the battlefield, and from the new plane or phenomenon will be put onto the stack. You’ll put all of your triggered abilities on the stack in any order, then each other player in turn order will do the same. (The last ability put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.)

The permanents will enter the battlefield while Morphic Tide is face up. This means the game won’t be on any plane when determining if any abilities trigger because those permanents entered the battlefield, for example. However, you’ll planeswalk away from Morphic Tide before any such abilities are put on the stack. After you turn the next card of the planar deck face up, any abilities that triggered during the resolution of Morphic Tide (including any abilities that triggered because you encountered another phenomenon or planeswalked to the next plane) will be put on the stack. The planar controller will put their abilities on the stack in any order, followed by each other player in turn order. The last ability put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

Token permanents a player owns will count toward the number of cards that player reveals. They’ll be shuffled into that player’s library and subsequently cease to exist. A token’s owner is the player under whose control it first entered the battlefield.

cardCashing.name: Shiv
cardCashing.text:
All creatures have "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

rulings.text: A plane card is treated as if its text box included “When you roll {PW}, put this card on the bottom of its owner’s planar deck face down, then move the top card of your planar deck off that planar deck and turn it face up.” This is called the “planeswalking ability.”
A face-up plane card that’s turned face down becomes a new object with no relation to its previous existence. In particular, it loses all counters it may have had.

The controller of a face-up plane card is the player designated as the “planar controller.” Normally, the planar controller is whoever the active player is. However, if the current planar controller would leave the game, instead the next player in turn order that wouldn’t leave the game becomes the planar controller, then the old planar controller leaves the game. The new planar controller retains that designation until they leave the game or a different player becomes the active player, whichever comes first.

If an ability of a plane refers to “you,” it’s referring to whoever the plane’s controller is at the time, not to the player that started the game with that plane card in their deck. Many abilities of plane cards affect all players, while many others affect only the planar controller, so read each ability carefully.

cardCashing.flavor: "The only gold I need is the sheltering shimmer of the trees."

rulings.text: Once a creature with power 3 or greater has blocked this creature, changing the power of the blocking creature won’t cause this creature to become unblocked.

cardCashing.originalText: Giltgrove Stalker can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

cardCashing.name: Tilonalli's Crown
cardCashing.text:
Enchant creature
When Tilonalli's Crown enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.

foreignNames.name: Tilonallis Krone
foreignNames.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Wenn Tilonallis Krone ins Spiel kommt, fügt sie der verzauberten Kreatur 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +3/+0 und verursacht Trampelschaden.

foreignNames.name: Corona de Tilonalli
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura.
Cuando la Corona de Tilonalli entre al campo de batalla, hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura encantada.
La criatura encantada obtiene +3/+0 y tiene la habilidad de arrollar.

foreignNames.name: Couronne de Tilonalli
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : créature
Quand la Couronne de Tilonalli arrive sur le champ de bataille, elle inflige 1 blessure à la créature enchantée.
La créature enchantée gagne +3/+0 et a le piétinement.

foreignNames.name: Corona di Tilonalli
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura
Quando la Corona di Tilonalli entra nel campo di battaglia, infligge 1 danno alla creatura incantata.
La creatura incantata prende +3/+0 e ha travolgere.

foreignNames.name: ティロナーリの冠
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
ティロナーリの冠が戦場に出たとき、これはエンチャントされているクリーチャーに１点のダメージを与える。
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは、＋３/＋０の修整を受けるとともにトランプルを持つ。

foreignNames.name: 틸로날리의 왕관
foreignNames.text:
생물에게 부여
틸로날리의 왕관이 전장에 들어올 때, 틸로날리의 왕관은 부여된 생물에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
부여된 생물은 +3/+0을 받고 돌진을 가진다.

foreignNames.name: Coroa de Tilonalli
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura
Quando Coroa de Tilonalli entra no campo de batalha, ela causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura encantada.
A criatura encantada recebe +3/+0 e tem atropelar.

foreignNames.name: Корона Тилоналли
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать существо
Когда Корона Тилоналли выходит на поле битвы, она наносит 1 повреждение зачарованному существу.
Зачарованное существо получает +3/+0 и имеет Пробивной удар.

foreignNames.name: 蒂洛纳理之冠
foreignNames.text:
结附于生物
当蒂洛纳理之冠进战场时，它对所结附的生物造成1点伤害。
所结附的生物得+3/+0且具有践踏异能。

foreignNames.name: 蒂洛納理之冠
foreignNames.text:
結附於生物
當蒂洛納理之冠進戰場時，它對所結附的生物造成1點傷害。
所結附的生物得+3/+0且具有踐踏異能。
